text: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

text: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
author: Charles Morgan

text: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

text: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

text: Every song you're trying to find something that going to connect in different ways but for me the songs that I'm really drawn to are inspirational, songs that lift you and that everybody can relate to no matter where you're from.
author: Rodney Atkins

text: I am very conscious of who I am as an artist and as an inspirational person.
author: R. Kelly

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

text: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.
author: Taylor Dayne

text: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
author: Joseph Wood Krutch

text: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.
author: Boris Vallejo

text: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

text: I think the end goal, hopefully, is to take advantage of the attention I've gotten along the way and use it for good and build some communities, and as I get older I can continue to do things and be surrounded by things that are inspirational to me.
author: Reggie Watts

text: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.
author: Anna Deavere Smith

text: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: We convince by our presence.
author: Walt Whitman

text: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.
author: Roma Downey

text: I've done a lot of albums and I kinda know when I'm onto something that was inspirational for me to record and create, and this was one of those projects where I really enjoyed making the album.
author: Lee Ritenour

text: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
author: Blaise Pascal

text: Think with your whole body.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

text: I'd like to one day be featured on a list of inspirational people who have made a difference in the world, whether it be helping underprivileged people or putting an end to the poaching of wildlife in Africa.
author: Candice Swanepoel

text: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
author: Wallis Simpson

text: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.
author: George Lucas

text: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
author: Smokey Robinson

text: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
author: Bill Copeland

text: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

text: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.
author: Jack Youngblood

text: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: Give light and people will find the way.
author: Ella Baker

text: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

text: A concerted effort to preserve our heritage is a vital link to our cultural, educational, aesthetic, inspirational, and economic legacies - all of the things that quite literally make us who we are.
author: Steve Berry

text: Enthusiasm moves the world.
author: Arthur Balfour

text: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.
author: Michael Gove

text: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
author: Meister Eckhart

text: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

text: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

text: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
author: Arlen Specter

text: A place for everything, everything in its place.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

text: I will always desire to play with Bruce Springsteen. He's the most inspirational, most dedicated, most committed and most focused artist I've ever seen. I like to be around people like that.
author: Max Weinberg

text: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
author: Mary Kay Ash

text: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
author: Amy Sedaris

text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
author: Emile Zola

text: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

text: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
author: Sylvester Stallone

text: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
author: Augustus Hare

text: Our ideals are our better selves.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

text: I love inspirational R&ampB, like Mary J. Blige and Jennifer Hudson. I want to do that. That kind of music stays with you.
author: Ashthon Jones

text: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive.
author: Carter Burwell

text: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
author: Morgan Freeman

text: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.
author: Cheryl Crawford

text: Almost every college playwright or sketch or improv comedian was sort of aware of Christopher Durang - even kids in high school. His short plays were so accessible to younger people and I think that was inspirational to me.
author: Mindy Kaling

text: I try not to put anything political on the forefront of what I'm trying to do creatively. At the same time, I do think it's wonderful when I hear people say that it's inspirational that I'm an Indian woman on camera. My life is very diverse, and my friends are a diverse group of people.
author: Mindy Kaling

text: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
author: Amelia Barr

text: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

text: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
author: Ben Okri

text: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
author: Pope Paul VI

text: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
author: Joyce Meyer

text: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
author: Victor Hugo

text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
author: Mark Hopkins

text: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
author: Pope John XXIII

text: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

text: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
author: Donald Cargill

text: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
author: Henry Rollins

text: A man has to learn that he cannot command things, but that he can command himself that he cannot coerce the wills of others, but that he can mold and master his own will: and things serve him who serves Truth people seek guidance of him who is master of himself.
author: James Allen

text: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
author: Albert Camus

text: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
author: Michael Jackson

text: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
author: Thomas Merton

text: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?
author: Stephen Colbert

text: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
author: Audre Lorde

text: I love a lot of the New York bands, but Patti Smith stands out. I just read 'Just Kids' and it's an inspirational, well-written account of an emerging New York artist in the late seventies.
author: James Iha

text: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
author: Joseph Campbell

text: If it were not for hopes, the heart would break.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.
author: Smokey Robinson

text: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
author: Peter Diamandis

text: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
author: Leo Buscaglia

text: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
author: Bernard Williams

text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank

text: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
author: Jean Paul

text: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

text: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children.
author: Harvey Weinstein

text: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us in joy we face the storm and defy it.
author: Amelia Barr

text: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

text: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. I just love the Seventies style, the way all the players dressed nice, you know, kept their hair looking good, drove sharp cars and they talked real slick.
author: Snoop Dogg

text: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
author: Fulton J. Sheen

text: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

text: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
author: Han Suyin

text: I do love to eavesdrop. It's inspirational, not only for subject matter but for actual dialogue, the way people talk.
author: Lynda Barry

text: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

text: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.
author: Hosea Ballou

text: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
author: John Muir

text: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.
author: Smokey Robinson
